# actor.list

## Description
Lists all actors associated with the token used. Can be filtered by tags in the query string.

## Code Examples

<CodeGroup title='Request' tag='GET' label='https://api.rivet.gg/actors'>

curl -X GET 'https://api.rivet.gg/actors'
```

// Create Rivet client

// Make request
await RIVET.actor.list({
  // Add your request body here
});
```
